questions.question: The travellers rested under a …………………….. of trees.
While taking a stroll in my garden, I was attacked by a ………………………… of bees.
What will you do if you find an abandoned ………………………….. of kittens?
Each of these novels ……………………… worth reading.
questions.description: Use a singular verb after each.

questions.question: The children were accompanied …………………….. their mother.
I found ……………………….. empty bottle floating on the water.
He, as well as I, ……………………….. great interest in politics.
questions.description: When we connect two nouns with as well as, the verb agrees with the former.

questions.question: The minister unlike his sons ……………………… honest.
questions.description: Here the subject is the singular noun minister.
